ygData.subject: Perhaps the Gemchopper needs an actual gem to work?
ygData.msgSnippet: As mentioned in my previous post, I tried the gemchopper in a tool box with a perl and got jack... However that does not rule out the possibility that it might
ygData.messageBody:
As mentioned in my previous post, I tried the gemchopper in a tool box with a perl and got jack...

However that does not rule out the possibility that it might work with some thing that is actually a gem, like a ruby or a diamond or something. Perhaps a less expensive gem.

Talked to a GM after I made my first chopper, all he said was that it chops gems... Has anyone tried right clicking on it or something to see if it can be used directly on a gem? Seems to be pretty fucking worthless as a gem chopper to me.

FizzWizz of Tunare
